alert.note: Alert for Clay; Cloud; Dickinson; Ottawa (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:22AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Dickinson, Ottawa, southwestern Clay and western Cloud Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 321 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Barnard to 4 miles northeast of Salina. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Minneapolis, Solomon, Bennington, Miltonvale, Glasco, Delphos, Tescott, Jamestown, Culver, Wells, Manchester, Longford, Oak Hill, Niles, Talmage, Moonlight and Ada. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 267 and 278. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
